div.p: atha tatrabhavān prākṛtakavikumudakumudinīnāyakaḥ śālivāhanaś cikīrṣitagāthākoṣasyāvighnaparisamāptaye kṛtaṃ maṅgalaṃ śrotṛhitārtham upanibadhnāti—

pasubaïṇa iti | mām upeṣkṣya katham ayam anyāṃ dhyāyatīti roṣeṇāruṇayā pratimayā saṃkrāntaḥ | prākṛte pūrvanipātāniyamāt saṃkrāntapratimaṃ vā yad gaurīmukhaṃ tadeva candro yatra taṃ paśupateḥ saṃdhyāsalilāñjaliṃ namatety anvayaḥ | raktamukhapratibimbacchalena gṛhītārghocitaraktapaṅkajam ivety utprekṣā | yadvā māninyāḥ praṇayaroṣam asahamānaṃ nāyakaṃ prati dūtyā uktir iyam—‘anabhijño 'si premavyavahārāṇāṃ yas tvaṃ priyāpraṇayaroṣalakṣaṇe harṣasthāne kupyasi | na paśyasi kiṃ devyāḥ saṃdhyāsalilāñjalāv api praṇayaroṣam’ iti ||

lg.l: amiaṃamaa pāuakavvaṃ paḍhiuṃ souṃ a je ṇa āṇanti |
kāmassa tattatantiṃ kuṇanti te kahaṁ ṇa lajjanti || 2 ||
[amṛtaṃ prākṛtakāvyaṃ paṭhituṃ śrotuṃ ca ye na jānanti |
kāmasya tattvacintāṃ kurvanti te kathaṃ na lajjante ||]

div.p: amiam iti | śṛṅgārarasanirbharatvenāhlādakatvād amṛtam ivāmṛtaṃ prākṛtakāvyam avasare paṭhituṃ parapaṭhitaṃ ca śrotuṃ boddhuṃ ye na jānanti, atha ca kāmasya tattvacintāṃ tantravārtāṃ vā kurvanti te kathaṃ na lajjanta ity arthaḥ | kāmaśāstravyutpattividhuraṃ prati vidagdhanāyikoktir vā ||
priyaviśeṣopataptayā kayācit preṣitā nisṛṣṭārthā dūtī nāyakam utkarṣayantī bhaṅgyā svasakhīmaraṇaṃ sūcayantī āha—

lg.l: kha-ga-pustakayor asyā agrimāyāś ca gāthāyā vyatyayo 'stisaccaṃ jāṇaï daṭṭhuṃ sarisammi jaṇammi jujjae rāorāa |
maraü ṇa tumaṃ bhaṇissaṃ maraṇaṃ vi salāhaṇijjaṃ se || 12 ||
[satyaṃ jānāti draṣṭuṃ sadṛśe jane yujyate rāgaḥ |
mriyatāṃ na tvāṃ bhaṇiṣyāmi maraṇam api ślāghanīyaṃ tasyāḥasyāḥ ||]

div.p: saccam iti | yato 'nanyarūpaślāghinī tvadrūpam eva bahu manyata ity āśayaḥ | sadṛśe jane yujyate rāga ity anena rūpābhijanādibhir anurūpe tvayi tasyāḥ samāgamautsukyaṃ yuktam eveti nāyikāyāḥ stutyanurāgābhyāṃ nāyakaprotsāhanam | mriyatām ity anena nāyakasyānabhyupagame strīvadhapātakam, ātmanaś ca prārthanābhaṅgabhīrutvaṃ darśitam | maraṇam apīty ādinā cānurūpānuṣṭhānāt tvadgatacittāyā maraṇe janmāntare tvatprāptisaṃbhavo vyajyate ||
